Sentence: Krakauer next visits with McCandless's family, beginning with his (McCandless) father, Walt McCandless, and his (McCandless) mother, Billie McCandless
Billie shows Krakauer photographs of Christopher's childhood and Walt describes the heartbreak his (McCandless) son has caused the family
In an epilogue, the author visits the bus again with Walt and Billie McCandless, Christopher McCandless's mother and father
